channel.title: Posts on jfp
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on jfp

item.title: Account Management System Migration
item.description: The time has been approaching for some time now and it has finally arrived: the CISE Account Management System has undergone a major overhaul and has been fundamentally restructured with user experience and simplicity in mind. If you never had a legacy CISE account, you may be wondering what all of this is about. If you did have a legacy CISE account, you may be worrying how this will affect you and your old account.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: My first post on this website! Hopefully many more to come… rm -rf / Don’t do this kids…
